sqlMap.select: SELECT /* HRMD0100.SEARCH00.공통코드상세 테이블 조회 */ DISTINCT D.COMD_CODE AS EXPD_CODE , D.COMD_CDNM AS EXPD_NAME , D.SORT_ORDR , 'number' AS DISP_TYPE FROM HR_MASTXM X /* [인사기본정보] */ INNER JOIN TABLE(SF_HR_MASTXM(X.EMPL_NUMB, #STDS_DATE#)) A ON X.EMPL_NUMB = A.EMPL_NUMB LEFT JOIN TABLE(SF_TM_DEPTXM(#STDS_DATE#)) B ON A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_CODEXD D ON D.COMM_CODE = 'OPOS_CODE' AND D.COMD_CODE = A.OPOS_CODE WHERE A.WODN_CODE = '1' /* 재직구분 */ AND D.COMD_CODE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY D.SORT_ORDR

SELECT /* HRMD0100.SEARCH01.인사기본정보 테이블 조회 */ A.SECT_CODE , A.SECT_NAME , A.DEPT_CODE , A.DEPT_NAME , B.COMD_CDNM AS GNDR_CODE , A.DEPT_FCOD , CASE WHEN B.COMD_CODE = 'M' THEN EMPL_MTOT ELSE EMPL_FTOT END AS EMPL_STOT
, CASE WHEN B.COMD_CODE = 'M' THEN "M_$TM_CODEXD[].EXPD_CODE$" ELSE "F_$TM_CODEXD[].EXPD_CODE$" END AS "$TM_CODEXD[].EXPD_CODE$"
FROM ( SELECT SECT_CODE , SECT_NAME , DEPT_CODE , DEPT_NAME , DEPT_FCOD /* 부서전체코드 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN GNDR_CODE = 'M' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) EMPL_MTOT , SUM(CASE WHEN GNDR_CODE = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) EMPL_FTOT
, SUM(CASE WHEN "$TM_CODEXD[].EXPD_CODE$" = 'M' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) "M_$TM_CODEXD[].EXPD_CODE$"
, SUM(CASE WHEN "$TM_CODEXD[].EXPD_CODE$" = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) "F_$TM_CODEXD[].EXPD_CODE$"
FROM ( SELECT A.EMPL_NUMB , B.SECT_CODE , B.SECT_NAME , A.DEPT_CODE , B.DEPT_NAME , B.DEPT_FCOD , A.GNDR_CODE , A.OPOS_CODE
, CASE WHEN A.OPOS_CODE IN (#TM_CODEXD[].EXPD_CODE#) THEN A.GNDR_CODE END AS "$TM_CODEXD[].EXPD_CODE$"
FROM HR_MASTXM X /* [인사기본정보] */ INNER JOIN TABLE(SF_HR_MASTXM(X.EMPL_NUMB, #STDS_DATE#)) A /* [인사기본정보-기준시점] */ ON X.EMPL_NUMB = A.EMPL_NUMB LEFT OUTER JOIN TABLE(SF_TM_DEPTXM(#STDS_DATE#)) B /* [부서정보-기준시점조직도] */ ON A.DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE WHERE A.WODN_CODE = '1' /* 재직구분코드 (1.재직) */ ) GROUP BY SECT_CODE, SECT_NAME, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, DEPT_FCOD ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TM_CODEXD B ON B.COMM_CODE = 'GNDR_CODE' ORDER BY A.DEPT_FCOD, A.SECT_CODE, B.COMD_CDNM
